channel.title: Devolution Revolution V1.7
channel.description:
Released tomorrow, need few more updates.
Hey guys, I have been coding this server for some time now. I have made many updates, and the server base is Devolution V7. Yes I am a beginner, but I love to code and here is some of the stuff I have added.
----Updates---- -Same home -New npcs at home to guide you and tell you what to do -New fighting npcs, Half drop mage, Half drop melee -New key caves, New npcs there -Added new teleports and new npcs there -Added Smithing -Added full Thieving -New bosses around teleports -More Level Requirements for Bosses
-Varrock Npcs- -Zamorak Monk -Suit of armour -Battle Mages -Black Knights -White Knights -Same old Druids -Otherwordly Being -Palidons -Arizonian, Avatar of Magic -Arizonian, Avatar of Strength -Ogre Shamon -Shops, And talking Npcs
-Key Caves- -Fareed -same Giants and Chaos Druids -Arizonian Avatar of Range -Some range minions -Slash Bash
-Christmas Event Teleport- -Talking Santa -Gnomes
-Legends Guild Teleport- -Skeleton Champion -Skeleton Mages -Giant Rock Crab -Rock Crab Minions -Infernal Mages -Elf Warrior -Skeleton Hellhounds
-Champions Guild Teleport- -All Bosses Have Minions -Ice Queen Minions-Ice Giants and Warriors -Bandit Champion Minions-Bandits -Saradomin Wizard Minions-More wizards -Greater Demon- Minion-Lesser Demons -Damis, No armour Minion-Damis with armour -Elvarg
-Anakaral Teleport- -Barrows
-Carrelanger Teleport- -Jad
-Gharrock Teleport -Black Demon Minions-Zombies, because it's grave digger teleport
Well there is a lot more, but i'd have to look on server to see what else I have because all this is off the top of my head.
WHEN I RELEASE THERE WILL BE PICTURES
Thank You Void Ranger -Other names X thiever X, Double Edge

item.title: Devolution Revolution V1.7
item.dc:creator: @x_thiever_x x thiever x
item.description:
@x_thiever_x wrote:

Released tomorrow, need few more updates.

Hey guys, I have been coding this server for some time now. I have made many updates, and the server base is Devolution V7. Yes I am a beginner, but I love to code and here is some of the stuff I have added.

----Updates----
-Same home
-New npcs at home to guide you and tell you what to do
-New fighting npcs, Half drop mage, Half drop melee
-New key caves, New npcs there
-Added new teleports and new npcs there
-Added Smithing
-Added full Thieving
-New bosses around teleports
-More Level Requirements for Bosses

-Varrock Npcs-
-Zamorak Monk
-Suit of armour
-Battle Mages
-Black Knights
-White Knights
-Same old Druids
-Otherwordly Being
-Palidons
-Arizonian, Avatar of Magic
-Arizonian, Avatar of Strength
-Ogre Shamon
-Shops, And talking Npcs

-Key Caves-
-Fareed
-same Giants and Chaos Druids
-Arizonian Avatar of Range
-Some range minions
-Slash Bash

-Christmas Event Teleport-
-Talking Santa
-Gnomes

-Legends Guild Teleport-
-Skeleton Champion
-Skeleton Mages
-Giant Rock Crab
-Rock Crab Minions
-Infernal Mages
-Elf Warrior
-Skeleton Hellhounds

-Champions Guild Teleport-
-All Bosses Have Minions
-Ice Queen
Minions-Ice Giants and Warriors
-Bandit Champion
Minions-Bandits
-Saradomin Wizard
Minions-More wizards
-Greater Demon-
Minion-Lesser Demons
-Damis, No armour
Minion-Damis with armour
-Elvarg

-Anakaral Teleport-
-Barrows

-Carrelanger Teleport-
-Jad

-Gharrock Teleport
-Black Demon
Minions-Zombies, because it’s grave digger teleport

Well there is a lot more, but i’d have to look on server to see what else I have because all this is off the top of my head.

WHEN I RELEASE THERE WILL BE PICTURES

Thank You
Void Ranger
-Other names
X thiever X, Double Edge
